column5: Good day from the Vermilion Bay dock.Finally some water and 20c weather today.Feeling like summer
Ice gone in 14 days? I'm skeptical.

Hope your right Gord.I guide on the opener.Keeping fingers crossed.I ice fished few days ago and that made me skeptical about ice out with the amount of ice there was.But there will be some open water someplace.Keep a eye out on Long Lake when that goes Eagle goes a week later.
Probably be able to fish off the dock at every resort,but let's hope for the better,32 inches of ice on lac des millacs
Could get crowded on the docks.Cheap on gas which climbed today
Climb almost daily in the states,might have to push the truck half way to Ontario.
